overview: When the Zampons are released into a small community, no one would expect the outcome. This new brand of tampons weren't ready to hit store shelves. They cause "toxic shock syndrome" once inserted. All over the small town women are turning into zombies. So now its up to Lance and Jay to kill their loved ones before anyone else gets the chance to.
tagline: It's that time of the month!
title: Toxic Shock Zombies
